data.name: Shepherd Tile Roofing
data.address: 1560 E Southlake Blvd Suite 100D, Southlake, TX 76092

reviews.text: 1560 E Southlake Blvd Suite 100D, Southlake, TX 76092 Confirmed by this business 5 weeks ago Working hard to beat the holiday clock! ⏰ Our guys are putting in the extra hours this week to make sure everyone's home is watertight and protected before the deep winter sets in and things shut down for Christmas. We truly appreciate their dedication! They are the best in DFW. #ShepherdCrew #DFWConstruction #RoofingLife
Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"They are customer friendly and driven to meet the customers needs!" "This was hands down the easiest home improvement project we’ve ever done." "Thank you for your prompt, professional service."

The repair man was very nice and detailed in the process that he would do. They were on time and got the job done really quick and it was done correctly. I would recommend them for and job that you might need done, not just for roofing. Great company! More Response from the owner a month ago

Hi Tina, we absolutely appreciate your fantastic review! It's wonderful to know our team's prompt and thorough service made a good impression. We're grateful for your recommendation and thrilled you found our work commendable. Looking forward to any future projects together!

They did a great job identifying the leak and keeping us informed every step of the way!  Very professional and would highly recommend! Response from the owner 2 months ago We truly appreciate your kind words, Rosalie! 😊 It's wonderful to know you felt well-informed and taken care of throughout the repair process. Thank you for recommending us so highly. We're here for you whenever you need us again! …

Shepherd Renovations did a great job on my roof. They were able to fit the project in their schedule, which was important for me due to the fact that I wanted to fix the roof as soon as possible. The team was very professional, responsive and thorough. Would recommend them! Response from the owner 5 months ago We really appreciate you taking the time to share your positive experience! It's wonderful to know you found our team prompt and professional. We're always here to help you with any future
